message.body: At the marathon, walking back. Everything is okay but aside from hearing bangs we can't tell what happened. Are you okay?
I'm fine. There were a couple of explosions
Lots of ambulances and the area is being evacuated. Come back to Longwood medical area sweet pea!!!!
Yea we heard them. It seems pretty serious
I don't know yet. Just happy to hear you are safe. Ariel and mark are safe and sound too. Let me know if you need anything!!!! Ok!!???!! I'm at massart working so feel free to stop by
Thanks Sofie, I really appreciate it
